alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:57PM MDT until June 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN STANLEY...EASTERN HUGHES AND NORTH CENTRAL LYMAN COUNTIES... At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cedar Creek Rec Area, or 18 miles northwest of Lower Brule, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Joe Creek Rec Area around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include West Bend Rec Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
